biotools.summary: DeepRescore is an immunopeptidomics data analysis tool that leverages deep learning-derived peptide features to rescore peptide-spectrum matches (PSMs). DeepRescore takes as input MS/MS data in MGF format and identification results from a search engine. The current version supports four search engines, MS-GF+, Comet, X!Tandem, and MaxQuant.
